General.Name: Fujian Newland Computer Co Ltd
General.Description: Newland Digital Technology Co.,Ltd. provides bar code, financial POS terminal equipment, mobile and other communications, and IoT services in China and internationally. The company offers financial software and financial terminal platform operation management services; electronic payment services for commercial banks and third-party payment service agencies; information technology, business support, and domains and network support operation services; and system and service platforms, cloud computing, and big data services. It also provides data recognition engine, code scanning gun, PDA, embedded scanner, desktop scanner, wearable scanner, professional smart tablet, handling robot, embedded artificial intelligence technology, equipment management software system, etc.; and merchant operation and value-added services. The company was formerly known as Fujian Newland Computer Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Newland Digital Technology Co.,Ltd. in November 2018. Newland Digital Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 1 Rujiang West Road, Fuzhou, China, 350015
